description: This file serves as the entry point for a React web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styling, and the main App component, and then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' using ReactDOM's createRoot API.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering into the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
